title: Hellmann's Mayonnaise
generatedText: Hellmann's Mayonnaise: This product is an outstanding match if you like to buy products that are vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free. This product has 37 ingredients (in our experience: the fewer ingredients, the better!) This product contains 40 calories, 4.5g grams of fat, 0g grams of protein, and 0g grams of carbs per serving. This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid.

ingredients.name: natural flavor
ingredients.description: The term "natural flavors" can hide a lot of gross sources of flavor, such as the notorious castoreum from the anal sacs of beavers. Of course, this does not mean these flavorings are harmful, but since you cannot really be sure of what you are getting, it is wise to be cautious.

ingredients.name: xanthan gum
ingredients.description: While it could cause gastrointestinal issues in sensitive individuals, xanthan gum seems to be safe in adults. Infants, however, should not be given products with xanthan gum, as there have been cases of infants dying after developing necrotizing enterocolitis, potentially as a result of consuming a product made from xanthan gum. Xanthan gum can be made from different sources, so if you are allergic to corn, wheat, soy, or dairy, check with the manufacturer before consuming a product with xanthan gum.

ingredients.name: food color
ingredients.description: Color additives are tricky - both colors that we might perceive as natural (e.g. fruit juice and turmeric) and artificial colors (e.g. Red 3) might turn up on a food label under "artifical color" or "color added." This makes it difficult to know how safe these colorings are, since you do not know exactly what you are consuming. The FDA is wise not to make a distinction, however, because the process of extracting natural colors is far from natural and these substances are not necessarily safer!

ingredientList: Water, Soybean Oil, Vinegar, Modified Corn Starch (Ingredient Not in Mayonnaise), Whole Eggs and Egg Yolks, Sugar, Salt, Xanthan Gum (Ingredient Not in Mayonnaise), Calcium Disodium EDTA and Sorbic Acid (Ingredient Not in Mayonnaise) (Used to Protect Quality), Phosphoric Acid (Ingredient Not in Mayonnaise), Lemon Juice, DL Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Natural Flavor, Beta-Carotene (Ingredient Not in Mayonnaise) (Color), Citric Acid, Paprika Oleoresin. Gluten free
